titles.title: We Praise Thee O God Our Redeemer

authors.author: A. Valerius Julia Bulkley Cady Cory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We praise Thee, O God, newline Our Redeemer, Creator newline In grateful devotion newline Our tribute we bring; newline We lay it before Thee, newline We kneel and adore Thee, newline We bless Thy holy name, newline Glad praises we sing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We worship Thee, newline God of our fathers, newline We bless Thee newline Thru life's storm and tempest, newline Our guide has Thou been; newline When perils o'er take us, newline Escape Thou wilt make us, newline And with Thy help, O Lord, newline Our battles we win.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With voices united newline Our praises we offer newline To Thee, great Jehovah, newline Glad anthems we raise; newline Thy strong arm will guide us, newline Our God is beside us, newline To Thee, our great Redeemer, newline Forever be praise!
